wikipedia_page.main: Norman Lock (13 March 1912 – February 1999) was an English cricketer. He played one first-class match for Surrey in 1934.

response: *1979: Norman Lock, Issue 76, "The Love of Stanley Marvel & Claire Moon"
*2001 : The House of Correction by Norman Lock, directed by George Loros, with Nunzio Caponio, at the Marilyn Monroe Theater.
